name: A loner's walk to paradise
description:
And so the nights go by, wondering what life is and how dreams can be an alternate reality.. dismissing the life she's living, she prayed for an everlasting dream to come true & falls asleep.. * eyes barely open* *gets up on her feet*... and she asks "Where Am I ? --- This place... wow.. I can't believe it.. the cosmos.. the sun, i can nearly touch it.. but...but...this overwhelming pressure.. I can't stand it.. This place is so beautiful unlike anything I've ever seen... But I need to make my way out of here.. I miss you mom.. i miss you dad.. I can't be trapped here any longer.. Here I go....

--- It's a platform running game in the cosmos,, a dream.. you have little time left to help her escape this drift.. 

--- feedback~ My 13 yr old cousin said the following : The game feels great but as the theme is 'escaping' there should be something in the game that expresses that idea, and so I implemented "timer"
